title: Mic check
body: All this talk about the red carpet and celebrities has me thinking: wouldn't it be funny to dress up like a reporter and interview Puff Daddy? No? What if, right in the middle of the interview, you bonked him in the nads with the microphone?! Yeah! That would be hilarious! It would make that ultra-satisfying "thunk" noise and everyone would laugh. Of course, you'd probably be killed within the hour by Diddy's entourage, but the endless airtime that the "thunk" moment would get would be well worth it.
author: Dan

comments.author: Maddy
comments.body: Shouldn't you be asleep right now, preparing for that long drive to STL?

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Can't sleep. We were watching LOST.

comments.author: Maddy
comments.body: LOST is the only acceptable excuse for missing class, work, sleep, weddings, funerals, dentist appointments, interviews, and the opening of presents on Christmas morning.  You are excused.

comments.author: Jessica
comments.body: There is actually somebody named Maddy.  Sorry for the random post but I just got a new puppy and when naming her was trying to think of a name for her that I haven't heard a person called and Maddi was it.

comments.author: Maddy
comments.body: Oh, Maddy is not my real name... but I know people named Madeline who go by Maddy
